text: Maria Jesuína Carrilho Bernardo (25 November 1943 – 6 February 2022) was a Portuguese politician. She was a member of the Socialist Party. She was in the Assembly of the Republic from 1995 to 1999 and again from 2005 to 2009. She was also a member of the European Parliament from 1999 to 2004. Carrilho was born in Beja, Portugal. Carrilho died in Lisbon, Portugal on 6 February 2022 at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:MEPs for Portugal
title: Maria Carrilho
